pageContext.claim: “Biden's plan is an economic death sentence for Pennsylvania, he will outlaw fracking and eradicate your economy. You had the greatest year you've ever had, last year.”
pageContext.analysis: Pennsylvania’s GDP largely tracks with the country’s GDP. The increases in the state’s economy began under the Obama administration. Moreover, a 2019 analysis by the Philadelphia Inquirer found that economic growth has been uneven, with counties that voted for Trump doing more poorly than counties that voted for Hillary Clinton.
